solution_line_template: She can make {total_drawings_capacity} drawings in total because {num_markers} x {drawings_per_marker} = <<{num_markers}*{drawings_per_marker}={total_drawings_capacity}>>{total_drawings_capacity}
She can make ten more because {total_drawings_capacity} - {drawings_already_made} = <<{total_drawings_capacity}-{drawings_already_made}={remaining_drawings}>>{remaining_drawings}
